hero.subtitle: Easily launch your ads on all major channels, watch them get optimized automatically and get the best ad results for your business.

budget_section.title: No experience or big budget needed
budget_section.description: New to online advertising? Learn how Shown helps you reach your advertising goals without the high costs of traditional solutions.

testimonials.testimonial_1: I started using Shown for my business and I'm really satisfied. A special thank you to the support team for helping me!
testimonials.testimonial_2: Shown is like a digital marketing guru sitting near me and saving my time by doing all the manual work!
testimonials.testimonial_3: I used Shown to advertise my 1 person business. I had very good results and I am happy with their automated tool & support plan.

campaign_creation.title: Create profitable ad campaigns in minutes
campaign_creation.point_1_desc: Create ad campaigns like the biggest brands in a matter of minutes. Discover the power of automation.
campaign_creation.point_2_title: Shown does the work for you.
campaign_creation.point_2_desc: Shown takes care of everything, from your ad targeting & copywriting to your ad creatives creation.
campaign_creation.point_3_title: Publish on all major ad platforms.
campaign_creation.point_3_desc: We support all major ad platforms in order to bring you the best return on investment.

optimization.title: Get your ads optimised 24/7
optimization.description: Shown will optimise your ads around the clock on every channel. Pausing keywords, creating new ads to A/B test or simply suggesting new targeting, Shown will cover it all.

dashboard_control.title: Remain in control with our all-in-one dashboard
dashboard_control.description: See how your ad campaigns are performing or import existing campaigns to have a single point of truth. Compare different channels, campaigns & ads at a glance.
dashboard_control.point_1_desc: Create your campaigns from your dashboard, pilot them and get an overview of your campaigns performances and channels.
dashboard_control.point_2_title: ... And make better decisions with data
dashboard_control.point_2_desc: Keep an eye on your campaign performances and get insights on each of them.

budget_management.title: Manage all budgets from one place
budget_management.description: With Shown credits, you can effortlessly manage budgets on all ad platforms from one place and earn bonus credits as you spend.

integrations_section.title: Import relevant assets with Integrations
integrations_section.description: Integrate your different apps & synchronise all your valuable assets, such as email lists & product lists to create profitable ads.

join_section.title: Join 20,000 small businesses on Shown
join_section.description: Join our thriving community and experience the difference. Unlock growth opportunities to take your business to the next level.

newsletter.title: Subscribe to our newsletter
newsletter.description: Get the latest updates and tips directly in your inbox.

footer.description: Let AI run your ads & attract more customers effortlessly.
